Header: A person apprehended on suspicion of terrorist activities along with a blood stained car
Content: Police STF arrested a person at Kalmunaikudi in Kalmunai on suspicion of terrorist links. Police media spokesman’s office said that the police STF officers took into  custody the car bearing number the E.P. K.M. 5059 with blood stains and a phone containing suspicious bomb attack photographs. Subsequently the suspect was handed over to the Kalmunai police for further investigations.
